briefdescription.para: QgsMapRendererCache ID string for cached label image.
Render time (in ms) per layer, by layer ID.
Stop the rendering job - does not return until the job has terminated.

detaileddescription.para: Does nothing if the rendering is not active.

briefdescription.para: Triggers cancelation of the rendering job without blocking.

detaileddescription.para: The render job will continue to operate until it is able to cancel, at which stage the finished() signal will be emitted. Does nothing if the rendering is not active.

briefdescription.para: List of errors that happened during the rendering job - available when the rendering has been finished.
Returns the feature filter provider used by the QgsRenderContext of each LayerRenderJob.
Tell whether the rendering job is currently running in background.
Returns map settings with which this job was started.

simplesect.para: A QgsMapSettings instance with render settings

briefdescription.para: Returns the render time (in ms) per layer.
Returns the total time it took to finish the job (in milliseconds).
Assign a cache to be used for reading and storing rendered images of individual layers.

detaileddescription.para: Does not take ownership of the object.

briefdescription.para: Set the feature filter provider used by the QgsRenderContext of each LayerRenderJob.

detaileddescription.para:
Ownership is not transferred and the provider must not be deleted before the render job.
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Start the rendering job and immediately return.

detaileddescription.para: Does nothing if the rendering is already in progress.

briefdescription.para: Gets pointer to internal labeling engine (in order to get access to the results).

detaileddescription.para:
This should not be used if cached labeling was redrawn - see usedCachedLabels().
usedCachedLabels()

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the render job was able to use a cached labeling solution.

detaileddescription.para:
If so, any previously stored labeling results (see takeLabelingResults()) should be retained.
takeLabelingResults()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Block until the job has finished.
emitted when asynchronous rendering is finished (or canceled).
Emitted when the layers are rendered.

detaileddescription.para: Rendering labels is not yet done. If the fully rendered layer including labels is required use finished() instead.

briefdescription.para: Handles clean up tasks for a label job, including deletion of images and storing cached label results.
Prepares the cache for storing the result of labeling.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns false if the render cannot use cached labels and should not cache the result.
not available in Python bindings

briefdescription.para: Prepares a labeling job.
Convenience function to project an extent into the layer source CRS, but also split it into two extents if it crosses the +/- 180 degree line.

detaileddescription.para: Modifies the given extent to be in the source CRS coordinates, and if it was split, returns true, and also sets the contents of the r2 parameter

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for map rendering implementations.

detaileddescription.para: The API is designed in a way that rendering is done asynchronously, therefore the caller is not blocked while the rendering is in progress. Non-blocking operation is quite important because the rendering can take considerable amount of time.

Common use case: 0. prepare QgsMapSettings with rendering configuration (extent, layer, map size, ...)
create QgsMapRendererJob subclass with QgsMapSettings instance
connect to job's finished() signal
call start(). Map rendering will start in background, the function immediately returns
at some point, slot connected to finished() signal is called, map rendering is done
It is possible to cancel the rendering job while it is active by calling cancel() function.

The following subclasses are available:
QgsMapRendererSequentialJob - renders map in one background thread to an image
QgsMapRendererParallelJob - renders map in multiple background threads to an image
QgsMapRendererCustomPainterJob - renders map with given QPainter in one background thread
